GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.32 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Fix potential AB/BA lock with buffer_mutex and mmap_lock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 7777744e92a0b30e3e0cce2758d911837011ebd9, it was introduced in version v5.15.32 by commit 47711ff10c7e126702cfa725f6d86ef529d15a5f. For more details please see the references link.
